parameter.descr: The name of a database to use (without the .db)
parameter.name: Database name

parameter.descr: Defines if the '.db' extension need to be appended to the DB_NAME argument
parameter.name: Append '.db'

parameter.descr: Directory where the database file is stored
parameter.name: Directory

parameter.descr: Enable usage of extra collation methods (LOCALE and DCASE)
parameter.name: Localized comparisons

parameter.descr: Allow SQLite to load extensions using the load_extension() function
parameter.name: Allow extensions
